catentdesc.name: Synergy Athletic Shoes
catentdesc.longdescription: She will speed down the playing field in these sporty and stylish shoes from Synergy. With a leather upper, nylon lining, and a rubber sole, these quality-made shoes will handle all the wear and tear of an active, athletic girl.

catentdesc.name: Mayflower Girls' Ballet Slippers with Ribbon
catentdesc.longdescription: Pretty little ballet flats for a pretty little girl. She will love twirling about in these adorable ribboned shoes from Mayflower.

catentdesc.name: Emery Shiny Ballet Flats
catentdesc.longdescription: Shoes with pizzazz! Her personality will shine in these sparkling ballet flats with nylon lining and synthetic sole. From Emery.

catentdesc.name: Emery Classic Mary Jane Shoes
catentdesc.longdescription: Smart and comfortable! These cute buckled Mary Jane shoes with faux leather upper and rubber soles, feel great and look even better.

catentdesc.name: Mayflower Girls' Strapped Ballet Slippers
catentdesc.longdescription: Check out these shiny strapped ballet slippers from Mayflower. An adorable little bow adds to their charm. Available in pink, for ages 6 to 24 months.

catentdesc.name: Coolers Girls' Running Shoe
catentdesc.longdescription: Who wants to walk when you can run in these! Combining style and function, these fabulous athletic shoes from Coolers will have her racing ahead of the crowd.

catentdesc.name: Synergy Sneaker-Style Flats
catentdesc.longdescription: These fantastic flats from Synergy, with their sneaker-like appearance, look and feel great. With a plaid pattern and pretty pink bow embellishment, these aren 't just any old flats. They have style!

catentdesc.name: Mayflower Patent Leather Mary Jane Shoes
catentdesc.shortdescription: Girls ' patent leather Mary Jane shoes
catentdesc.longdescription: For when little ladies need to dress up! These black patent leather Mary Jane flats are perfect for a special little girl on a special occasion. Available in sizes 2T to 5T.
